description.1: Technical minecraft, yet a relaxed environment to play on.
description.2: You can find here a long-term mindset, a friendly community and a lot of moss.

copy-ip.title: Copied Server IP!
copy-ip.description: Paste this in your Minecraft server list.

standard.description: Additionally, you can just search "Kryeit" inside the Modrinth App.

advanced.description: Note that this is prone to bugs, and errors client-side.

home.disclaimer: NOT AN OFFICIAL MINECRAFT SERVICE. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG OR MICROSOFT.

username-input.hint: It MUST be your Minecraft username

password-input.hint: Use a unique password for this website

auth.verify-disclaimer: (*) Accounts need to be verified inside the Minecraft server to avoid being deleted in a day.
